::Killfest/Demise::

Killfest smiles, recieving the transmission. New bots were always 
welcome. He relays an order through his internal communication system 
with his team.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recieving Killfest's orders, Demise breaks away from the run, heading 
toward the new bot, who wasn't too far away.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RickEKildahl@a... wrote:
> Red Bolt sits, recalling what he has seen. He stands, unfolds his 
wings, 
> jumps off the cliff, and begins flying towards the distant neutral 
base. 
> Suddenly, his wing begins to short out, and he falls to the ground. 
Red Bolt 
> discovers his right arm 50 feet away. He activates his computer, 
and starts 
> shouting over the airwaves: "Someone respond, I'm critically 
injured, someone 
> respond!"
